location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Translation of a letter from Sooltan ben Sugger [Sultan bin Saqr] of Sherjeh [Sharjah] to William Bruce, Resident at Bushire

physicalDescription.extent: Condition: The last sentence and signature of the translator have been obscured owing to damage to the letter.

mods.abstract: The letter is explaining recent incidents in which boats have been captured and insisting that the Sultan would not break his treaty with the English.This letter would be dated as 21 December 1816 by the Gregorian calendar.
